package.name: DefaultPage

descriptionlist.description: Set the default homescreen page to go to on home button click. Also set the default page to download new applications on. There are many other side features that can be configured in settings.

package.changelog: Rewrite preferences so it is cached now (making it less resource intensive)4 Fix crashes on downloading new icons for iOS 11+ with default download page option enabled Double make sure the page selected is opened after respring (cause why not?)
